audioText: Le chien a crié de douleur quand le vétérinaire a examiné sa patte blessée.
question: Why did the dog cry out?
options: The dog cried because it was happy to see the vet
The dog cried out in pain when the vet examined its injured paw
The dog cried because it was afraid of the clinic
The dog cried because it wanted to go home
explanation: The text states 'Le chien a crié de douleur quand le vétérinaire a examiné sa patte blessée' - The dog cried out in pain when the veterinarian examined its injured paw. The past participle 'crié' (cried/cried out) shows the completed action in the past.
